Package cams.util.ui

Class ScannerHelper

java.lang.Object
cams.util.ui.ScannerHelper
public class ScannerHelper extends Object
Helper class for Scanner inputs with exception handling and input validation.

      public static int getIntegerInput(String prompt, int min)

      min - Minimum input (exclusive).
      Returns:
      Validated input.

    • getIntegerInput

      public static int getIntegerInput(String prompt, int min, int max)
      Integer input with a minimum and maximum limit.
      Parameters:
      prompt - Text to prompt for the input, pass in empty string for no prompt.
      min - Minimum input (exclusive).
      max - Maximum input (exclusive).
      Returns:
      Validated input.

    • getIDInput

      public static String getIDInput(String prompt, List<String> acceptedValues, String errorMsg)
      Integer input with a list of accepted values. Used to get ID input.
      Parameters:
      prompt - Text to prompt for the input, pass in empty string for no prompt.
      acceptedValues - List of accepted values.
      errorMsg - Error Message to provide to the user.
      Returns:
      ID String.

    • getYesNoInput

      public static boolean getYesNoInput(String prompt)
      Yes/No input for boolean values.
      Parameters:
      prompt - Text to prompt for the input, pass in empty string for no prompt.
      Returns:
      true if yes, false if no.
